author: Balkrishna Agarwal <krishna@teziapp.com>
description: Starter Monorepo using Turbo of Nodejs + Fastify + OrchidORM + oRPC + Reactjs with opentelemetry setup
name: connected-repo

scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .yarn/cache && yarn cache clean
scripts.test:e2e: bash -c 'if [[ "$*" == *"--build"* || "$*" == *"-b"* ]]; then turbo run test:e2e:with-build; else turbo run test:e2e:no-build; fi' --
scripts.test:e2e:ui: bash -c 'if [[ "$*" == *"--build"* || "$*" == *"-b"* ]]; then turbo run test:e2e:ui:with-build; else turbo run test:e2e:ui:no-build; fi' --
